title: Ghostly Super Mega Death Rocket
body: Hey. To make a long story short, the Jinx on our team fired her ultimate towards a Lissandra that was around 600-800 units in front of her. I believe the Lissandra had just used her Ice Claw but had already come out of it. It would have been a direct hit, but the rocket went directly through her. I'm not sure what happened there. Even though this is a bug report, it wasn't about me but the Jinx. I was on Nami but I doubt that I was a part of the bug.

replies.body: Happened a few times there is video of it.
